          <title>
            <string language="en">Waves and vibrations through the spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellen und Erschütterungen durch den Frühling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues et vibrations par le ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas e vibrações através da mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde e vibrazioni tramite la molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύματα και δονήσεις μέσω του ελατηρίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas y vibraciones a través del resorte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the waves and vibrations travelling along the same direction through the spring.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Wellen und die 
Erschütterungen, die entlang die gleiche Richtung durch den Frühling
reisen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les vagues et les vibrations 
voyageant le long de la même direction par le ressort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as ondas e as vibrações que
viajam ao longo do mesmo sentido através da mola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra le onde e le vibrazioni che 
attraversano lungo lo stesso senso through la molla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τα κύματα και δονήσεις 
που ταξιδεύουν κατά μήκος της ίδιας κατεύθυνσης μέσω του 
ελατηρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra las ondas y las vibraciones 
que viajan a lo largo de la misma dirección a través del resorte.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
